p.k: The Academy / Throne of Bones / Costume Contest / Demon Prom Robin creates the Teen Titan Awards in an effort to get his teammates to clean up the Tower. / When the other Titans start listening to heavy metal music, Robin warns them of the dangers. / Sick of losing the costume contest to the Hive Five every year, the Titans hatch a scheme to win. / Trigon makes Raven attend her prom and she brings along the other Titans to upset him.
